meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lasting or enduring.
meanings.sent1: The lastingnesses of the friendship between Sarah and Emily is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The lastingnesses of the ancient ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: Despite their bickering, the lastingnesses of their bond was undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The lastingnesses of the oak tree's roots symbolize strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The lastingnesses of the memories from that summer will always bring a smile to my face.

meanings.definition: The lasting quality or duration of something.
meanings.sent1: The lastingnesses of the paint on the walls is impressive.
meanings.sent2: The lastingnesses of the battery in my phone is quite short.
meanings.sent3: The lastingnesses of the ice cream in the sun was a race against time.
meanings.sent4: The lastingnesses of the star's light traveled millions of years to reach us.
meanings.sent5: The lastingnesses of the impact of her words lingered long after she left the room.
